name: Drop Bear V2
description:
Taro the koala has 60 seconds to gather leaves as he descends down a fragile tree that is on the verge of being disintegrated! Will you collect the necessary amount of leaves (a score of 200) within the time limit or be consumed by the tree? 

2D assets drawn by me :D

Music: Bass Boss - Louie Zong https://louiezong.bandcamp.com/album/levels

SFX: Kennery https://www.kenney.nl/assets/interface-sounds

Use arrow keys to navigate

(WARNING: shaking camera and flashing screen at 20 seconds)
